metadata.title: CVE-2014-8181 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The kernel in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 and MRG-2 does not clear garbagedata for SG_IO buffer, which may leaking sensitive information touserspace.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
